publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3633 Tricia Marwick: Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union—That the Parliament deplores comments in respect of members of the Fire Brigades Union, attributed to a Scottish Minister in Scotland on Sunday on 24 November 2002, that " these people aren’t socialists, they’re protectionists, they’re fascists " and, if the comments do not represent the view of the Scottish Executive, calls for an apology to be made to firefighters.

S1M-3633 Tricia Marwick: Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union—That the Parliament deplores comments in respect of members of the Fire Brigades Union, attributed to a Scottish Minister in Scotland on Sunday on 24 November 2002, that " these people aren’t socialists, they’re protectionists, they’re fascists "*;* if the comments do not represent the view of the Scottish Executive, calls for an apology to be made to firefighters*, and notes that Dr Richard Simpson MSP has publicly confirmed that he was the minister referred to in the article.*Supported by: Kay Ullrich*, Michael Matheson*, Dennis Canavan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-3633 Tricia Marwick: Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union—That the Parliament deplores comments in respect of members of the Fire Brigades Union, attributed to a Scottish Minister in Scotland on Sunday on 24 November 2002, that " these people aren’t socialists, they’re protectionists, they’re fascists "; if the comments do not represent the view of the Scottish Executive, calls for an apology to be made to firefighters, and notes that Dr Richard Simpson MSP has publicly confirmed that he was the minister referred to in the article.Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Michael Matheson, Dennis Canavan, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3633 Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union (lodged on 25 November 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3633 Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union (lodged on 25 November 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3633 Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union (lodged on 25 November 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-3633 Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union (lodged on 25 November 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-3633 Scottish Executive's Position on the Fire Brigades Union (lodged on 25 November 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
